Decorations.name: Tables and Chairs
Decorations.desc: Found in taverns, inns, or dining areas, these items create spaces for role-playing interactions, resting, or tactical positioning during combat encounters.

Decorations.name: Bookshelves
Decorations.desc: These can be placed in libraries, wizard towers, or study rooms. They may hold valuable books with lore, spells, or hints for quests.

Decorations.name: Barrels and Crates
Decorations.desc: Commonly found in storage areas, warehouses, or dungeons, these containers may contain supplies, loot, or even hidden passages.

Environmental Details.name: Cobwebs and Dust
Environmental Details.desc: In abandoned areas or long-forgotten chambers, these details set the tone for mystery and neglect.

Environmental Details.name: Runes and Glyphs
Environmental Details.desc: Engraved on walls or floors, these symbols can be clues or trigger magical effects when activated.

Environmental Details.name: Banners and Tapestries
Environmental Details.desc: Decorating the walls of castles, guild halls, or fortresses, these items add character to the locations.

Atmospheric Elements.name: Fireplace and Hearth
Atmospheric Elements.desc: Warmth and ambiance in cold environments. Players can gather around for comfort or strategic planning.

Atmospheric Elements.name: Steam Vents
Atmospheric Elements.desc: Vents that release hot steam and can be used strategically in combat or puzzle-solving.

Atmospheric Elements.name: Frozen Statues
Atmospheric Elements.desc: Statues covered in ice, which players can melt to reveal hidden passages or items.

Treasure Hoards.name: Jeweled Chests
Treasure Hoards.desc: Elaborate chests filled with valuable treasures, guarded by monsters or traps.

Treasure Hoards.name: Golden Altars
Treasure Hoards.desc: Altars adorned with gold and gems that require offerings or rituals to gain rewards.

Treasure Hoards.name: Precious Gems
Treasure Hoards.desc: Scattered gems throughout the map, valuable as trade items or components for magical rituals.

Cursed Objects.name: Haunted Mirrors
Cursed Objects.desc: Mirrors that reveal unsettling reflections or transport players to parallel dimensions.

Cursed Objects.name: Cursed Jewelry
Cursed Objects.desc: Accessories that bestow powers but come with dangerous side effects, like a necklace that grants invisibility but drains life force.

Cursed Objects.name: Possessed Objects
Cursed Objects.desc: Everyday items like swords, paintings, or candles that may be temporarily inhabited by malevolent spirits.

Mystical Relics.name: Artifact Pedestals
Mystical Relics.desc: Pedestals that display ancient artifacts, each with unique powers. Players can interact with these relics or use them to uncover their hidden abilities.

Mystical Relics.name: Mystic Obelisks
Mystical Relics.desc: Tall, mysterious obelisks that may grant blessings or curses to those who interact with them.

Mystical Relics.name: Time-worn Tomes
Mystical Relics.desc: Old books scattered throughout the map, containing forgotten knowledge, spells, or quests for players to discover.
